apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Map dependencies of AssetLoader.
The following depedencies are available after executing this Command:
IAssetLoader

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This utility allows you to easily load external assets into your application.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
This utility allows you to easily load external assets into your application.
All the assets which are loaded by the AssetLoader are stored and can be retrieved at any time. This can be done by retrieving the asset by it's url or unique id.
The AssetLoader also allows you to load a group of assets at once. Therefore you will get a Group returned instead of an single Asset. That Group will have as well as the Asset an unique id you can use to retrieve it at another point within your application.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Loading states for Assets and Groups.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Loading states for Assets and Groups.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Custom error Class for an AssetLoader.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Custom error Class for an AssetLoader.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Automatic assigned type of Asset for loading stylesheets (css).

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Automatic assigned type of Asset for loading stylesheets (css).

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Automatic assigned type of Asset for loading Bitmaps (swf).

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Automatic assigned type of Asset for loading Bitmaps (swf).

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Automatic assigned type of Asset for loading Bitmaps (xml).

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Automatic assigned type of Asset for loading Bitmaps (xml).

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Automatic assigned type of Asset for loading Bitmaps (mp3, wav, aif).

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Automatic assigned type of Asset for loading Bitmaps (mp3, wav, aif).

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Automatic assigned type of Asset for loading Bitmaps (png, gif, jpg and jpeg).

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Automatic assigned type of Asset for loading Bitmaps (png, gif, jpg and jpeg).

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The interface definition for an Asset.

Map dependencies of Layers.
The following depedencies are available after executing this Command:
ILayers

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Transfer a Layer to an other childIndex in the contextView.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Transfer a Layer to an other childIndex in the contextView.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Remove a Layer from the contextView.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Remove a Layer from the contextView.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Add a Layer to the contextView.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Add a Layer to the contextView.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This utility allows you to manage your displayList in layers.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
This utility allows you to manage your displayList in layers.
The advantage of using Layers is that you have all your type of viewComponents at one place. For example all Pages are added in a Layer named pages. By using Layers you can easily switch the user interface on and off while navigating. Therefore we advice you to use Navigator or page transitions. Remember to set the property lockLayersWhileTransitioning of Navigator to true . You can also manually set the user interface on and off of the independend Layers.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Custom error Class for an AssetLoader.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Custom error Class for an AssetLoader.

The following depedencies are available after executing this Command:
ILocalizer

apiClassifier.shortdesc: This utility allows you to automatically map iterations of XML or Object data in the Injector.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: This utility allows you to automatically map iterations of XML or Object data in the Injector.

apiClassifier.shortdesc: The interface definition for an Locale.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: The interface definition for an Locale.

INavigator

The following depedencies are available after executing this Command:
IRouter

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Map a Command to a specific Route.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Map a Command to a specific Route.

Map dependencies of Styles.
The following depedencies are available after executing this Command:
IStyles

apiClassifier.shortdesc: Utility to map dependencies of certain utilities.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc:
Utility to map dependencies of certain utilities.
Probably the best place to define your mappings is in the mapInjections method of your Context. You can simply call the method mapDepedencies of Utilities to determine all your mappings for the following utilities.
AssetLoader
Layers
Localizer
Navigator
Router
Styles
